content: Is there presently a domain routing solution from within Backdrop for websites that have sections that certain domains should resolve to, rather than all going to the home page? I am not referring to multisite - just multiple domain mapping.
If a solution exists for Drupal 7 it's plausible it could be ported to Backdrop

@Eliza Olivares - I think you are looking for the equivalent of Domain Access Module for Drupal?

Domain Access module allows you to configure multiple domains to a single Drupal site and then select which nodes are used on which domain. It's a very powerful module and I have used it extensively for Drupal 7, but I have not yet found a similar solution for Backdrop CMS.

https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/domain-access-equivalent

Here is a link to the port request. You might want to comment there if you are interested in this module.
https://github.com/backdrop-ops/contrib/issues/400
